name: Orange Cup
description:
A young, tea-loving girl named Camryn wants to leave her cup-shaped island in search for new teas, but an evil witch has turned the only sailor on the island into stone! Luckily, she - initially a skeptic of anything whimsical - mysteriously gained magical powers as a side effect of the witches magic. Now, she can rescue the sailor and defeat the evil witch with her new abilities!

---

Version 1.1.0 Updates

- Fixed the double-jump bug.
- Fixed other bugs and glitches that may impede with gameplay.
- Some changes in item, enemy and scenery placement.
- Some minor consmetic changes.

---

Controls

Arrow keys: move Camryn
Z: Jump
X: Cast current magic
Tab: Switch between available magic
Enter: Pause game
Esc (while paused): Exit game
